summary: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.
cast: George Clooney|Natascha McElhone|Viola Davis|Jeremy Davies|Ulrich Tukur|John Cho|Morgan Rusler|Shane Skelton|Donna Kimball|Michael Ensign|Elpidia Carrillo|Kent Faulcon|Lauren Cohn|Tony Clemons|Jennie Baek|Dale Hawes|Annie Morgan|Antonio Rochira|Jude S. Walko
keywords: space station|space|planet|trapped in space|title at the end
title: Solaris
